pages.text: $(li)Sugar Cane are a kind of tall grass that can be found near sources of water of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can use Sugar Canes to craft $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/paper)Paper$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar)Sugar$(/l), $(l)Reed Thatch$(), or $(l)Sugar Cane Bundle$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)You can plant it in any Sand or Dirt block while there is a water block near it.$(br)$(li)There is no difference in groth rate using one of those blocks.$(br)$(li)This block will be able to grow up to 3 blocks high.
